name: Sea Kayak South Route 2
description:
This route starts in a beach 90 Km south from Lima,  we will take you there in our transport,  you just wait in your hotel and we will pick you up.

This time,  after 10 kilometres full of impressive landscapes, cliffs and several islets,  we are going to land our sea kayaks in a beautiful island where you can enjoy a terrific small beach and wildlife, if you are lucky you will see penguins, sea lions and dolphins,  after that we will return with our sea kayaks and a lot of pics.

This route is not for beginners so let us know your sea kayaking experience.  

After the route we will take you back to your hotel
